a bacteria the can cause death
an element of the periodic table
the nearest major galaxy to the milky way
arrSimpleAnswers: the nearest major galaxy to the milky way

arrSimpleMathChoices: Every action has an equal opposite reaction
The force acting on an object is equal to the mass of an object times its acceleration
An object in motion stays in motion unless acted upon by an unbalanced force
arrSimpleAnswers: An object in motion stays in motion unless acted upon by an unbalanced force

arrSimpleMathChoices: A language has a written form; a dialect doesn't
A language is spoken across an entire country; a dialect is only spoken in parts of a country
Speakers of two different languages can't understand each other; speakers of two dialects of the same language can
arrSimpleAnswers: Speakers of two different languages can't understand each other; speakers of two dialects of the same language can
